LanguageData.Gene_Archon.label: Commander
LanguageData.Gene_Archon.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Commander magical path. Highmates, Archons, and Bruxas have this natural bloodline.
LanguageData.Gene_Archotechist.label: Legate
LanguageData.Gene_Archotechist.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Legate magical path. Vampires and Archons have this natural endobloodlinegene.
LanguageData.Gene_Chronopath.label: Chronomancer
LanguageData.Gene_Chronopath.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Chronomancer magical path. Genies, Vampires, and Archons have this natural bloodline.
LanguageData.Gene_Conflagrator.label: Pyromancer
LanguageData.Gene_Conflagrator.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Pyromancer magical path. Impids have this natural bloodline.
LanguageData.Gene_Empath.label: Bard
LanguageData.Gene_Empath.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Bard magical path. Highmates and Lowmates have this natural bloodline.
LanguageData.Gene_Frostshaper.label: Cryomancer
LanguageData.Gene_Frostshaper.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Cryomancer magical path. Yttakins and Neanderthals have this natural bloodline.
LanguageData.Gene_Harmonist.label: Psion
LanguageData.Gene_Harmonist.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Psion magical path. Genies and Strigoi have this natural bloodline.
LanguageData.Gene_Necropath.label: Necromancer
LanguageData.Gene_Necropath.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Necromancer magical path. Wasters and Ekkimians have this natural bloodline.
LanguageData.Gene_Nightstalker.label: Rogue
LanguageData.Gene_Nightstalker.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Rogue magical path. Dirtmoles and Ekkimians have this natural bloodline.
LanguageData.Gene_Protector.label: Paladin
LanguageData.Gene_Protector.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Paladin magical path. Neanderthals, Wasters, and Pigskins have this natural bloodline.
LanguageData.Gene_Skipmaster.label: Conjurer
LanguageData.Gene_Skipmaster.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Conjurer magical path. Hussars and Saurids have this natural bloodline.
LanguageData.Gene_Staticlord.label: Electromancer
LanguageData.Gene_Staticlord.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Electromancer magical path. Impids and Saurids have this natural bloodline.
LanguageData.Gene_Technomancer.label: Artificer
LanguageData.Gene_Technomancer.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Artificer magical path. Genies and Dirtmoles have this natural bloodline.
LanguageData.Gene_Warlord.label: Barbarian
LanguageData.Gene_Warlord.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Barbarian magical path. Uhlans, Hussars, Yttakins, and Strigoi have this natural bloodline.
LanguageData.Gene_Wildspeaker.label: Druid
LanguageData.Gene_Wildspeaker.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Druid magical path. Yttakins, Pigskin, and Phytokin have this natural bloodline.
LanguageData.Gene_Hemosage.label: Vampire
LanguageData.Gene_Hemosage.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Vampire magical path. All vampires have this natural bloodline.
LanguageData.Gene_Puppeteer.label: Puppeteer
LanguageData.Gene_Puppeteer.description: Carriers of this gene are able to learn the Puppeteer magical path. Highmate, Fungoid, and Bruxa have this natural bloodline.
